body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Christian Walker and I'm a Customer Support Agent at ABC Car Dealership. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Victoria Perry.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Victoria. Could you please provide me with your phone number, so we can reach you in case we need more information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, two three six, seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you, Victoria. And could you also provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is Victoria dot Perry at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Victoria. We will look into the data management issue related to our Car Dealership. Your feedback is valuable to us.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for your time today, Victoria.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Christian. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Victoria. Have a great day.
